Item.Value: Why hello. I haven't seen you around here before, I'd have remembered. The name's $Character_8$ and believe me, it's a pleasure to meet you.
Oh, hello $Name$. Care to join me for a hot drink this evening?
Hello, $Name$. Enjoying the winter? You should come visit me at the tavern some time soon. I've got just the thing to ward off the cold.
You're always running around. Don't you ever just take a break and relax? Try to take it easy sometimes, ok?
Off again $Name$? If you need to relax after, you know where I'll be.
There's something almost peaceful about the swamp, you know? It's a dreary place, but it's beautiful in its own way. We should go there some time.
Is that for me? Oh! Thank you! It's just what I've been looking for! How did you know?
Hello, what can I do for you?.{Talk:Talk|Gift:GiveGift|%Friend:50%Join Party:Party|Never Mind:Cancel}
Certainly, I'd like to see what we can accomplish together.
Sorry,I'm very busy today. Maybe in a few days I can go with you again.
